statements: DELETE FROM hydropower_projects WHERE project_id = 100 AND total_cost > 500000;
DELETE FROM hydropower_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' OR completion_date > '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM CostAnalysis WHERE project_id = 3 AND date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM CostAnalysis WHERE id = 100 AND amount > 5000
DELETE FROM HydropowerProjects WHERE location = 'California' AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM hydropower_projects WHERE project_name = 'Project X' AND location = 'River Valley';
